name: Mythos Run
description:
Mythos Run is a game created for the Game Jam Off 2022 by Github with the theme "cliché".

Play as an American archaeology student traveling the world to research local legendary and mythological creatures. Your first stop: a small village in Romania, where rumour has it that the castle ruins are none other than the home of the Count Dracula himself. Will you be able to uncover the veil of mystery and save the locals from the vampiric curse?

A 3D horror adventure with comedic twist, this game was made possible thanks to the effort of no less than 13 people who worked together for a month as a team.

The game demo is free to download- and expect it to be worth it. We tried our best to polish it in time for the needs of the Game Jam Off 2022 by Github, so that any player can give it a try and have a pleasant experience. 

The sounds and music in particular are just marvellous; it was not in vain that we had not one, not two, but three amazing sound designers.  Also our 3d artists are really great and the models look just great, even greater than usual thanks to the works of our 2d artists making the game more appealing to the human eye. The story is crafted with the upmost care by our writer, who has a prodigious mind, and a great way of directing (and also helping) our two talented to say the least voice artists.

Creating this game was a pleasant experience for all of us, and we are proud to present our finished demo. There are many more things we would like to add in the future, but we are sure you will enjoy what we have so far. And if you do, we would be happy to hear from you!
